entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
